attributes.contentHtml: FloopGloop If you're taking it as offensive, you're doing something wrong. Take them as advice, especially as you're still quite fairly new, the information bein cherrypicked about your hosts are from their experience, knowledge and observations. If they're not satisfied, obviously you're doing something wrong.
